advancedchathud.config.general.info.time:
How time is displayed if §6Show Time§r is enabled for both the §9Chat HUD§r and the §aChat Log§r. 
See the §6SimpleDateFormat§r class for the format
advancedchathud.config.general.info.chat: Whether or not the §6head of the message sender§r displays beside their message
advancedchathud.config.match.screen.name: Matches
advancedchathud.config.general.info.vani:
Enables the §6Vanilla Chat HUD§r that acts mostly like a §9Chat Window§r.
§6Vanilla Chat HUD§r can use §9Chat Tabs§r if you click on it and then change the tab.
advancedchathud.config.general.info.widt:
The §6width §rof the §9Chat HUD 
Overrides Vanilla chat width!
advancedchathud.config.general.info.heig:
The §6height §rof the §9Chat HUD 
Overrides Vanilla chat width!
advancedchathud.config.general.info.show: Whether or not §bChat Tabs §rare visible on the §6side§r of the §9Chat HUD
advancedchathud.config.general.info.left: The amount of space between the §6left side§r of the chat box to where the §6text starts
advancedchathud.config.general.info.righ: The amount of space between the §6right side§r of the chat box to where the §6text breaks
advancedchathud.config.general.info.bott: The amount of space between the §6bottom§r of the chat box to the §6newest message
advancedchathud.config.general.info.topp: The amount of space between the §6top§r of the chat box to the §6old
advancedchathud.config.general.info.tabs:
The most amount of characters used for §6abbreviations§r of §bChat Tabs§r 
Affects the appearence of chat tabs §6beside§r the §9Chat HUD
advancedchathud.config.general.info.visi:
What the behavior of the §6visibility§r the §9Chat HUD§r should be 
§6Vanilla §r- §9Chat HUD §rrenders as it does in §6Vanilla 
§aAlways §r- Renders the §9Chat HUD §6at all times 
§cFocus Only §r- Renders the §9Chat HUD §6only §rif the §6Chat Box§r is open
advancedchathud.config.general.info.line: The §6space§r (in pixels) between lines of chat
advancedchathud.config.general.info.x: The §6x-coodinate §rof the chat box, starting at the §6bottom-left §rside of the screen
advancedchathud.config.general.info.y: The §6y-coodinate §rof the chat box, starting at the §6bottom-left §rside of the screen
advancedchathud.config.general.info.mess: How much space should be between §6individual messages
advancedchathud.config.general.info.chat: How §6big or small §rthe text §6inside§r of the chat box is. Does not affect the size of the §9Chat HUD§r!
advancedchathud.config.general.info.fade: The §6number of ticks §rbefore newly received messages begin to disappear

The §6easing function§r used for the fade animation 
Vanilla uses §6linear §reasing
advancedchathud.config.general.info.hudb: The color of the §6background §rof the §9Chat HUD
advancedchathud.config.general.info.empt: The color of text with §6no formatting §r(such as text formatted with §6§r)
advancedchathud.config.general.info.hudl:
How the §6background §rof the §6unfocused §9Chat HUD §ris fitted to the messages 
§6Full §r- Fits the background to the §6width §r of the §9Chat HUD §r 
§bCompact §r- Fits the background to the length of each respective §6line§r
advancedchathud.config.general.info.alte:
Whether or not the backgrounds of §6every other message §ris colored differently to create a §6striped§r effect 
§7Helps to differentiate between messages
advancedchathud.config.general.info.show:
Whether or not the §6time §ris displayed in the §9Chat HUD §r 
The format can be configured in §7General§r
advancedchathud.config.general.info.stor:
The §6maximum§r amount of lines stored in the §9Chat HUD§r 
§7Excessively large values may result in out-of-memory errors!
advancedchathud.config.general.info.righ: Whether or not §6tab buttons§r will display on the right side
advancedchathud.config.general.info.rend: Whether or not §6chat§r will render if another GUI is opened
advancedchathud.config.general.info.mini:
Enables a less cluttered window design. When active moving will not be possible.
The right click context menu can toggle this
advancedchathud.config.general.info.pers: Whether or not messages that are §6typed but not sent§r are kept after closing the §9Chat Box
advancedchathud.config.general.info.more: Whether or not messages that are §6over the 256 character limit§r are broken into multiple chat messages
advancedchathud.config.general.sendtocur: Always Send Message to Focused Tab
advancedchathud.config.general.info.send: Whether or not messages §6sent by you§r are displayed in the currently focused tab, §6regardless of the chat filter
advancedchathud.config.tab.name: Tab Name
advancedchathud.config.tab.info.name:
What the tab shows up as §6in the config 
§7§oIt is good practice to name your tabs meaningfully!
advancedchathud.config.tab.info.starting: What text shows up §6when the tab is focused§r
advancedchathud.config.tab.info.abbrevia: What the tab shows up as §6on the side of the §9Chat HUD§r if §6Show Chat Tabs§r is enabled under §9Chat HUD§r settings
advancedchathud.config.tab.info.forward: Whether or not messages sent to this chat tab also show up in the §6main chat tab§r
advancedchathud.config.tab.info.findstri: The string that will be §6searached§r and §6diverted to this tab§r
advancedchathud.config.tab.info.findtype:
How matches will be found
§6Literal §r- Matches §6exactly §rthe string
§eUpper-Lower §r- Like §6Literal, §rbut not §6case-sensitive
§bRegEx §r - Parses the string as a §6regular expression
§dAll §r- Passes §6all §rtext through to the tab, regardless of the string to find
advancedchathud.config.tab.info.borderco: The color of the §6outline§r of the §6chat tab§r
advancedchathud.config.tab.info.innercol: The color of the §6background§r of the §bchat tab
advancedchathud.config.tab.info.showunre: Whether or not the number of §6unread messages§r are displayed for the §bchat tab§r
